statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 OR price > 200 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_name LIKE '%orange%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, updated_at FROM products JOIN prices ON products.product_id = prices.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE updated_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT description, price FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM affiliates ORDER BY commission DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, pp.timestamp FROM products p INNER JOIN product_prices pp ON p.id = pp.product_id;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE commission >= 0.05 ORDER BY name;
SELECT p.name, pp.price FROM products p JOIN product_prices pp ON p.id = pp.product_id WHERE pp.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pp.price DESC;

SELECT a.name AS affiliate_name, p.name AS product_name, pp.price FROM affiliates a JOIN products p ON a.affiliate_id = p.affiliate_id JOIN product_prices pp ON p.id = pp.product_id WHERE pp.price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY a.name, pp.price;
SELECT p.id, p.name, pp.timestamp FROM products p JOIN product_prices pp ON p.id = pp.product_id WHERE p.price < (SELECT MAX(price) FROM product_prices) ORDER BY pp.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE brand='Nike';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, brand FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT website_name, website_url FROM affiliate_websites;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT p.product_name, r.reviewer_name, r.rating FROM products p JOIN product_reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, a.website_name FROM products p JOIN affiliate_websites a ON p.brand = a.website_name;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, u.new_price FROM products p JOIN price_updates u ON p.product_id = u.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) FROM product_categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products INNER JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id;
SELECT merchant_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM product_merchants GROUP BY merchant_name HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 AND price < 100;
SELECT p.product_name, m.merchant_name FROM products p JOIN product_merchants pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id JOIN merchants m ON pm.merchant_id = m.merchant_id;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.product_name ASC;
